main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in June 1958 in New Mexico and Texas.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a round orange object resembling jet exhaust,The second sighting described an object leaving a trail of fire,Reports were deemed inconclusive with the possibility of witness misinterpretation,The sightings were visually confirmed and accompanied by radar data,No photographs were available to substantiate the reports.
sighted object: one round orange object and one fiery object
